soybeans.Description: Soybeans are a major source of soybean oil, which is widely used in cooking and as a biodiesel fuel.
Soybeans are processed to produce soybean meal, which is a valuable protein source used in animal feed.
Soybeans are cultivated through soybean farming, which involves planting, growing, and harvesting soybean crops.
Soybean research focuses on improving soybean varieties, increasing yield, and developing sustainable farming practices.
